protein.specific_function: Actin cross-linking/gelling protein. Involved in calcium interactions and contractile properties of the cell that may contribute to replicative senescence

reference.reference_text: Thweatt R, Lumpkin CK Jr, Goldstein S: A novel gene encoding a smooth muscle protein is overexpressed in senescent human fibroblasts. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1992 Aug 31;187(1):1-7.
